scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development && parcel build src/index.html && parcel src/index.html -p 3000 --https
scripts.build:dev: rm -rfv ./dist && export NODE_ENV=development && parcel build src/index.html
scripts.build:prod: rm -rfv ./dist && export NODE_ENV=production && parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps --no-cache --no-autoinstall
